author: Carol Anderson
title: Republicans Could Use the Coronavirus to Suppress Votes Across the Country. This Week We Got a Preview
description: In 1946, Mississippi Senator Theodore Bilbo instructed his followers that the way to keep black people from voting was to get “the tar and feathers and don’t forget the match.” In the Jim Crow South, African Americans faced bullets, beatings, lynching and mor…
